text: Hungry cat lands in trouble:Officials use ropes to pull out a leopard which fell into a well in the heart of Guwahati on Saturday. The full grown leopard was later tranquillised and taken to the Guwahati Zoo. A forest official taking a look at the wild animal (Extreme right) . Villagers believe the big cat might have fallen into the well at night when it entered the city in search of prey. Due to illegal encroachment and rapid destruction of forests, wild animals enter human dwellings owing to the loss of habitat. Some NGOs allege that the Assam Forest Department is not taking steps to protect wild animals.— Photos: Ritu Raj Konwar
title: Leopard, trapped in a well in Guwahati, rescued by officials
